devdoc.author: https://github.com/holographxyz
devdoc.details: The contract stores a reference of all supported: chains, interfaces, functions, etc.

constructor.details: Constructor is left empty and init is used instead

contractURI(string,string,string,uint16,.details: Used to dynamically generate contract JSON payload

params.bps: basis points used for specifying royalties percentage
params.externalLink: url to website/page related to smart contract
params.imageURL: string pointing to the primary contract image, can be: https, ipfs, or ar (arweave)
params.name: the name of the smart contract

returns._0: a base64 encoded json string representing the smart contract

getUriPrepend(uint8).details: Provides the prepend to use with TokenUriType URI

init(bytes).details: This function is called by the deployer/factory when creating a contract

params.initPayload: abi encoded payload to use for contract initilaization

params.prepend: the string to use for the prepend
params.uriType: specify which TokenUriType to set for

params.prepends: array string to use for the prepends
params.uriTypes: specify array of TokenUriTypes to set for

_chainIdMap.details: Internal mapping of all ChainIdType conversions

_prependURI.details: Internal mapping of all TokenUriType prepends

_supportedInterfaces.details: Internal mapping of all InterfaceType interfaces

devdoc.title: Holograph Interfaces

contractURI(string,string,string,uint16,.notice: Get a base64 encoded contract URI JSON string

getUriPrepend(uint8).notice: Get the prepend to use for tokenURI

init(bytes).notice: Used internally to initialize the contract instead of through a constructor

t_mapping(t_enum(ChainIdType)25710,t_map.label: mapping(enum ChainIdType => mapping(uint256 => mapping(enum ChainIdType => uint256)))
